@DominikAngerer1 @devdevcharlie @storyblok @Netlify Well @Netlify is agnostic when it comes to static site generators. I personally enjoy @GoHugoIO and @gatsbyjs the most at the moment, but Metalsmith or @jekyllrb would also be useful references.
